input.sentences: i visited the museum with my class yesterday .
we saw some famous marble sculptures .
there were some sculptures made from metal too .
my favorite was the carving into the column near the stairs .
this weird ship mixed media piece was really cool too .
output.sentences: Yesterday we decided to visit the museum for the first time.
The detail on the famous marble sculptures was incredible.
Some sculptures were made from metal, and it was fascinating to imagine crafting them.
Our favorite part was the column by the stairs.
One item that lingered in our minds was a weird ship piece; it was unlike anything we'd seen before.
